name: TowerOfHanoi Demo
description:
This demo shows the classic game Tower of Hanoi. 

The goal is move all discs from the first Peg to the last Peg.  The only rule is the upper disc should smaller than the lower disc every time you moved. 

You can play the game by draging discs around.

Calculate Best Practice provides the best solution of the game. Also you can watch it  played automatically by clicking ShowMoves button.
